import { excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { Table } from '@looker/components'
import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'

<Meta component={Table} title="Docs/Table" />

# Table

The `<Table>` component defines a structure for the display of tabular data. A `<TableHeader>` is used to display the table header and the `<TableBody>` is used to show the data rows.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

<ArgsTable of={Table} exclude={excludedProps} />
